description: '''Strawberry Alarm Clock''' is a [[psychedelic rock]] band formed in 1967, originating in [[Glendale, California]], a city about ten miles north of downtown [[Los Angeles, California|Los Angeles]]. The band is best known for its 1967 [[hit single]] "[[Incense and Peppermints]]." Their music is categorized as [[acid rock]], [[psychedelic pop]], and [[sunshine pop]], and they charted five songs in the United States and Canada, including two Top 40 hits.
